```{r include=FALSE}

# Markdown options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, include=T)

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(volker)
theme_set(theme_bw())

# Recode -9 to NA
data <- prepare(volker::chatgpt)

# Add a label to sd_alter
data <- data %>% 
  set_item_labels(tibble(
    "sd_alter", 
    "Alter"
  ))
```

# Multiple variables
```{r}
report(data, c("sd_geschlecht", "cg_adoption_"))
```


# Group comparisons
```{r}
data %>% 
  filter(sd_geschlecht != "divers") %>% 
  report("cg_adoption_", "sd_geschlecht")

```
